'''Jueyun Guoba''' is food item that players can [[Cooking|cook]]. The [[recipe]] for Jueyun Guoba can be purchased from [[Ms. Bai]] at [[Qingce Village]].

Depending on the quality, Jueyun Guoba increases all party members' {{Color|Physical DMG}} by '''20'''/'''30'''/'''40'''% for 300 seconds. Like most other foods, this does not affect other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
